Package ru.cos.sim.road.link

Class Summary
EndOfLanePoint Point of the end of the lane.
Lane Lane of the road.
Link Link of the road network.
Segment Segment is a peace of one way road with uniform segmentGeometryData, i.e.
StartOfLanePoint  
TrapeziumSegment Trapezium road segment in which bases are last left and last right lanes (they are parallel), sides are cuts of the road.
 

Enum Summary
Segment.SegmentType Types of segments
